chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z v) u) x y

Premises:
ex_diff_n = fix ex_diff_n (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R) {struct n} : Prop := continuity_2d_pt f x y /\ match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f z y) x /\ ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => f x z) y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n0 x y /\ ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n0 x y end : (R -> R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope R_scope]
f = fun f : family => let (ind, f0, _) := f in f0 : family -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ R_scope R_scope] f is a coercion
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Derive = fun (f : R -> R) (x : R) => Rbar.real (Lim (fun h : R => (f (x + h) - f x) / h) (Rbar.Finite 0)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
continuity_2d_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y) < eps) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
partial_derive = fun (m k : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => Derive_n (fun t : R => Derive_n (fun z : R => f t z) k y) m x : nat -> nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope]
ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_1 : forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R => partial_derive p k f z y) x
ex_diff_n_ex_deriv_inf_2 : forall n p k : nat, (p + k < n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_derive (fun z : R_AbsRing => partial_derive p k f x z) y
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux1 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f z v) u) n x y
Schwarz_aux : forall (f : R -> R -> R_NormedModule) (x y : R) (eps : posreal), (forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < eps -> Rabs (v - y) < eps -> ex_derive (fun z : R => f z v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v) -> forall h k : R, Rabs h < eps -> Rabs k < eps -> let phi := fun k0 x0 : R => f x0 (y + k0) - f x0 y in exists u v : R, Rabs (u - x) <= Rabs h /\ Rabs (v - y) <= Rabs k /\ phi k (x + h) - phi k x = h * k * Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v
Schwarz : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => ex_derive (fun z : R => f z v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => f u z) v /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) v) u /\ ex_derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) u) v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) v) u) x y ->...-> Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f z t) y) x = Derive (fun z : R => Derive (fun t : R => f t z) x) y
ex_diff_n_deriv_aux2 : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f (S n) x y -> ex_diff_n (fun u v : R => Derive (fun z : R => f u z) v) n x y
Derive_sum_n : forall (f : nat -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), (forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive (f k) x) -> Derive (fun y : R => sum_n (fun k : nat => f k y) n) x = sum_n (fun k : nat => Derive (f k) x) n
partial_derive_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (p q : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> partial_derive p q f x y = partial_derive p q g x y
continuity_2d_pt_plus : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => f u v + g u v) x y
ex_diff_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (n : nat) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n g n x y
continuity_2d_pt_opp : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => - f u v) x y
ex_diff_n_deriv : forall n p q : nat, (p + q <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n (partial_derive p q f) (n - (p + q)) x y
continuity_2d_pt_mult : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => f u v * g u v) x y
continuity_2d_pt_minus : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => f u v - g u v) x y
continuity_2d_pt_inv : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y -> f x y <> 0 -> continuity_2d_pt (fun u v : R => / f u v) x y
continuity_2d_pt_ext_loc : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => f u v = g u v) x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y
ex_diff_n_m : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), ex_diff_n f n x y -> ex_diff_n f m x y
continuity_2d_pt_filterlim : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_2d_pt f x y < -> filterlim (fun z : R * R => f (fst z) (snd z)) (locally (x, y)) (locally (f x y))
continuity_1d_2d_pt_comp : forall (f : R -> R) (g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), continuity_pt f (g x y) -> continuity_2d_pt g x y -> continuity_2d_pt (fun x0 y0 : R => f (g x0 y0)) x y
partial_derive_add_zero : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (p q r s : nat) (x y : R), q = 0%nat \/ r = 0%nat -> partial_derive p q (partial_derive r s f) x y = partial_derive (p + r) (q + s) f x y
locally_2d_impl_strong : forall (P Q : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d (fun u v : R => locally_2d P u v -> Q u v) x y -> locally_2d P x y -> locally_2d Q x y
differentiable_continuity_pt : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), differentiable_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt f x y
is_derive_sum_n : forall (f : nat -> ?K -> ?V) (n : nat) (x : ?K) (d : nat -> ?V), (forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> is_derive (f k) x (d k)) -> is_derive (fun y : ?K => sum_n (fun k : nat => f k y) n) x (sum_n d n) where ?K : [ |- AbsRing] ?V : [ |- NormedModule ?K]
differential = fun (p : nat) (f : R -> R -> R) (x y dx dy : R) => sum_f_R0 (fun m : nat => C p m * partial_derive m (p - m) f x y * dx ^ m * dy ^ (p - m)) p : nat -> (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [nat_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
continuity_2d_pt_ext : forall (f g : R -> R -> R) (x y : R), (forall x0 y0 : R, f x0 y0 = g x0 y0) -> continuity_2d_pt f x y -> continuity_2d_pt g x y
locally_2d_forall : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), (forall u v : R, P u v) -> locally_2d P x y
differentiable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y lx ly : R) => forall eps : posreal, locally_2d (fun u v : R => Rabs (f u v - f x y - (lx * (u - x) + ly * (v - y))) <= eps * Rmax (Rabs (u - x)) (Rabs (v - y))) x y : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope R_scope]
continuity_2d_pt_id1 : forall x y : R, continuity_2d_pt (fun u _ : R => u) x y
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
continuity_2d_pt_id2 : forall x y : R, continuity_2d_pt (fun _ v : R => v) x y
locally_2d_1d_const_x : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally y (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P x t)
locally_2d_1d_const_y : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y -> locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => P t y)
Rmin_glb_lt : forall x y z : R, z < x -> z < y -> z < Rmin x y
Rmax_lub_lt : forall x y z : R, x < z -> y < z -> Rmax x y < z
Lim_seq.filterlim_Rbar_mult : forall x y z : Rbar.Rbar, Rbar.is_Rbar_mult x y z -> filterlim (fun z0 : R * R => fst z0 * snd z0) (filter_prod (Rbar_locally x) (Rbar_locally y)) (Rbar_locally z)
Nat.le_lt_add_lt : forall n m p q : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (p + m < q + n)%nat -> (p < q)%nat
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
plus_lt_reg_l : forall n m p : nat, (p + n < p + m)%nat -> (n < m)%nat
differentiable_pt = fun (f : R -> R -> R) (x y : R) => exists lx ly : R, differentiable_pt_lim f x y lx ly : (R -> R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Derive_ext_loc : forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) -> Derive f x = Derive g x

```coq
intros n p k H f x y H0.
unfold ex_diff_n in H0.
destruct H0 as [H0 _].
apply H0 in H.
apply derivable_pt_lim_derive in H.
unfold continuity_2d_pt.
intros eps.
apply H in eps.
auto.
Qed.
```
